article_title: Intuitive Surgical Wins Big With Department of Defense

article_metadata.description: Under the terms of the contract, there is no limit on the quantity of the robot or related instruments and accessories that would be ordered by the DoD. Although it is not necessary that the DoD will use up the entire $430 million allocated for the surgical system and its components, the contract is going to simplify the purchase process and increase the footprint of its product in the market.
article_metadata.author: Great Speculations
